description.narrative: IR2: Teachers in targeted primary schools contribute to a safe learning environment and apply child-friendly teaching methodologies including emerging issues by 2012, which contributes to Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2012, 85% of children both boys and girls have access to quality basi c education country wide
